subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Wary of wasting $46 million on one player, the Yankees are not about to give up on Kei Igawa, the left-handed pitcher from Japan who was a disappointment in 2007.
snippet: Wary of wasting $46 million on one player, the Yankees are not about to give up on Kei Igawa, the left-handed pitcher from Japan who was a disappointment in 2007.
